title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must state that both Firm Z is earning a positive accounting profit and explain why in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not state that Firm Z is earning a positive accounting profit and/or does not explain that the accounting profit is equal to implicit cost, or because the firm is in long-run equilibrium and is making zero economic profits, it is making a positive accounting profit.

The response states that Firm Z is earning a positive accounting profit and explains that the accounting profit is equal to implicit cost, or because the firm is in long-run equilibrium and is making zero economic profits, it is making a positive accounting profit.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Gobble is a monopoly or oligopoly, there are high barriers to entry in Gobble’s industry, or that Gobble has more market power than other firms in other industries.
The response states that Gobble is a monopoly or oligopoly, there are high barriers to entry in Gobble’s industry, or that Gobble has more market power than other firms in other industries.

title: Part (d)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the two products are substitutes.
The response states that the two products are substitutes.

title: Part (e)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
